Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingFragment.CaptureAnimation
    Please use MeterReadingView.CaptureAnimation instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingFragment.animateCapture(MeterReadingFragment.CaptureAnimation)
    com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingFragment.getBarcodeCaptureAnimation()
    Please use MeterReadingFragment.getBarcodeViewCaptureAnimation() instead.
    com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingFragment.getMeterReadingCaptureAnimation()
    Please use MeterReadingFragment.getMeterReadingViewCaptureAnimation() instead.
    com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingFragment.setBarcodeCaptureAnimation(MeterReadingFragment.CaptureAnimation)
    Please use MeterReadingFragment.setBarcodeCaptureAnimation(MeterReadingView.CaptureAnimation) instead.

    If you plan to verify detected barcode results in your implementation of the BarcodeReadingListener.onScanBarcodes(com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingFragment, java.util.List<com.pixolus.meterreading.BarcodeReadingResult>, android.graphics.Bitmap, com.pixolus.meterreading.Metadata) method, you might want to decide when to show the capture animation. You can therefore disable the automatic start of the animation by passing MeterReadingFragment.CaptureAnimation.NONE to this method and call MeterReadingFragment.animateCapture(com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingView.CaptureAnimation) to show the animation or implement your own.

    Default animation: MeterReadingFragment.CaptureAnimation.NONE
    com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingFragment.setMeterReadingCaptureAnimation(MeterReadingFragment.CaptureAnimation)
    Please use MeterReadingFragment.setMeterReadingCaptureAnimation(MeterReadingView.CaptureAnimation) instead.

    If you plan to verify meter reading results in your implementation of the MeterReadingListener.onScanReadings(com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingFragment, java.util.List<com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingResult>, android.graphics.Bitmap, com.pixolus.meterreading.Metadata) method, you might want to decide when to show the capture animation. You can therefore disable the automatic start of the animation by passing MeterReadingFragment.CaptureAnimation.NONE to this method and call MeterReadingFragment.animateCapture(com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingView.CaptureAnimation) to show the animation or implement your own.

    Default animation: MeterReadingFragment.CaptureAnimation.FLASH
    com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingFragment.setRegionOfInterestColor(int)
    Use MeterReadingFragment.setRegionOfInterestBorderColor(int) instead.
    com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterReadingView.setRegionOfInterestColor(int)
    Use MeterReadingView.setRegionOfInterestBorderColor(int) instead.
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    com.pixolus.meterreading.MeterAppearance.UNKNOWN
    The value INVALID is provided instead.
